title: Interpretation of a dream about plucking gray hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of plucking gray hair for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, either by shaving the beard and gray hair in the front of the head, or graying of the eyelashes, according to Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq. And others: plucking gray hair in a dream is one of the very annoying things that we see in our dreams all the time, and it causes a state of tension and conflict in the dreamer because of his fear of the hair and entering the stage of premature graying, which noticeably warns the person of advanced age, as gray hair is a change in hair color that turns to white. Which makes him look young and strange, unlike the black or original color, which is the beginning of the stages of gray hair. Interpretation of plucking gray hair in a dream: Whoever sees that he is plucking gray hair, then he is violating the Sunnah and falling short of good people. Imam Nabulsi explained to us in many of his interpretations that seeing gray hair in a dream is in many ways... Important interpretations that come to the dreamer, which must be known and taken into account. Interpretation of gray hair in a dream Gray hair in a dream is evidence of poverty and unhappiness in life. An increase in the number of gray hair in a dream is evidence of the strength of anxiety and distress that will afflict a person. Seeing white gray hair Completely in a dream is evidence of a misfortune that befalls the closest person. Graying hair in a dream completely indicates the death of one of his family members. Seeing gray hair for a student in a dream is evidence of dignity, good religion, and morals. Seeing a student in a dream that his hair turns gray is evidence of a long life. The dreamer. Interpretation of white hair in a dream. Seeing white hair in a traveler’s dream is evidence of the return of the absent person in the near future. Plucking white hair in a dream is a sign of misfortune that will befall a person in the near future. If one sees that his beard is gray in a dream, this is a sign of anxiety. And sadness in life. Interpretation of white hair in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman with her hair gray is evidence that she will suffer from sadness and distress in life. To dream of a girl spreading some gray hair in her hair is evidence of longevity and plenty of sustenance. Dyeing a girl’s hair white is evidence of Marriage. Interpretation of white hair in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman with gray hair in her dream means that she will give birth to an unjust child. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with a white beard is a sign of sadness and distress that will befall her. A pregnant woman seeing that her husband has turned his hair gray. To black is evidence of his great love for her. For a pregnant woman to see that her husband is young is evidence of his tyranny and hypocrisy in life. Interpretation of white hair in a dream for a married woman. The husband’s gray hair in a dream is evidence of his committing unacceptable actions. If a woman sees that her husband is turning some of his hair gray In a dream, and he was a good man, this is evidence of marriage to another woman very soon. Interpretation of white hair in a dream for a man: Seeing gray hair in a man’s dream is an indication of the problems he will suffer. A man seeing a woman with gray hair is evidence of changes in his life.

title: Meaning of rooster in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a rooster crowing in a dream is one of the popular topics that is often researched and disputed, and the crowing rooster in general is one of the beautiful and beloved things for many, and viewers of this dream are increasingly curious to know useful interpretations and opinions. Therefore, we will explain to you through our article the most important interpretations that you are looking for and show You have some interpretations and opinions of scholars and thinkers about this vision, so follow us to benefit from them. The meaning of a rooster in a dream. The opinions of thinkers and scholars differed in interpreting the meaning of a rooster crowing in a dream. Some of it portends good and some portends evil. Commentators also believe that seeing a rooster crowing in a dream is evidence of the muezzin and the call to prayer. This is considered a warning to him to pray regularly and not to neglect it. But when the dreamer sees in his dream a red rooster crowing, this indicates that the dreamer is characterized by a bad reputation and treatment of others. But if a person dreams of a rooster without crowing, this means that he will obtain a high position in his work. He achieves many achievements and improves his living conditions. The meaning of a rooster in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a rooster’s crow in a dream differed, and its meanings differed according to the circumstances of the fortuneteller. Ibn Sirin says that if the dreamer sees a rooster crowing in his dream, this is a good sign for him, because he will get A lot of livelihood and an important position in his work, and thus he enjoys a decent life. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing an unmarried young man crowing a rooster in a dream is a good sign for him as his wedding date approaches, and his condition improves and he finds a good job. However, if the dreamer sees in his dream that a rooster He crows at night, this means that there will be tension, sadness, and problems in his life, and thus a feeling of despair and fatigue. Interpretation of the meaning of a rooster in one dreamWe continue to talk about the interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman crowing a rooster in her dream, as thinkers and scholars agreed that this vision is good for the unmarried girl. When an unmarried woman sees a rooster crowing in her dream, this indicates a change in her condition and the fulfillment of her desire, and that the date of her marriage is approaching and she will live a happy and stable life. Also, if she sees a red or white rooster crowing, this means that she will succeed in her studies, achieve her future ambitions and goals, and raise her status among others. Her family and friends. What is the meaning of a rooster crowing in a dream for a married woman? The interpretation of the meaning of a rooster in a dream for a married woman is similar to the interpretation of a single dream, and the translator Ibn Sirin agreed with that. Ibn Sirin said: If a married woman sees a rooster crowing in her dream, this indicates her happiness and stability in Her life with her husband and family. If a married woman sees a white rooster crowing in her dream, this means that she will achieve her dreams and overcome the obstacles and problems that stood in the way of her success. The meaning of a rooster in a man’s dreamIt is important to mention the cases in which a man sees a rooster in his dream, which have many interpretations. Miscellaneous: If a man sees in his dream a rooster standing in front of his house, this portends evil. Either one of his relatives is about to die, or they are exposed to a serious illness, and God is Most High.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a lunar eclipse in a dream according to Ibn Sirin in all circumstances

preview.html: Interpretation of a lunar eclipse in a dream If, dear reader, you are looking for an interpretation of a lunar eclipse in a dream, its cracks, and an interpretation of a dream about the eclipse of two moons, here is this article through the encyclopedia. Some may not know the meaning of a lunar eclipse in reality to understand the interpretations, explanations and meanings it carries with it, so it is worth referring to it. It is about the Earth standing in front of the sunlight, so the sun's rays darken it, and it is considered one of the rare astronomical phenomena, so the viewer wakes up from its inertia in search of the symbols it carries. In its folds, we review it in our article, so follow us. The majority of scholars and jurists agreed on the interpretation of dreams that seeing a lunar eclipse is not considered a dream worthy of praise, and God knows best. Because it carries meanings that may indicate failure or problems and obstacles that hinder the fortuneteller's progress. Seeing a lunar eclipse in a dream symbolizes: exposing him to a financial loss, perhaps in his work or a new project in which he participates, or he may be exposed to great financial risks. But it is indicated that these losses will pass, God willing, but you must calm down and not take risks and pay attention to spending money. Seeing an eclipse in the dreamer is interpreted as follows: His scarcity in reality and his reluctance to spend money on his family and himself, which are among the undesirable qualities that our noble Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, referred to. Seeing an eclipse in a dream is interpreted as follows: The abundance of sins, disobedience and transgressions that he committed in his life, you must return to the Lord with a lot of forgiveness, prayer and supplication to God Almighty. Seeing an eclipse in a dream indicates. And the calamities that follow the dreamer's path in life, these crises are represented by the severity of the hand and the need for money, and God knows best. On the contrary, seeing a lunar eclipse in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that herald good, as it symbolizes the date on which the dreamer is approaching happiness in marriage or his arrival to the area of ​​financial stability. Interpretation of a dream of a lunar eclipse Seeing a lunar eclipse is not a good sign. Jurists said in the science of dream interpretation, regarding the interpretation of a dream of a lunar eclipse: The calamities that you find in the dreamer's life must be endured. Seeing a lunar eclipse in a dream symbolizes. To be afflicted with a disease, but it goes away by the command of God, and the Lord is the Most High and All-Knowing. While it may indicate joy, happiness, and the closest happiness to the seer in the event of the joy of the seer's soul and secrets, it indicates an imminent marriage and that God is the Most High. As for seeing the two moons in their transformation into the sun, they indicate the abundance of livelihood and abundance that God Almighty writes for the seer in his money and life, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the sun and the moon meet in a dream The dreamer wakes up from his sleep, wanting to know the interpretations contained in the vision of the meeting of the sun and the moon in a dream. Is it a commendable vision or a vision that does not bode well? We explain this in the following lines: Seeing the meeting of the sun and the moon is considered one of the good visions that bode well. In particular, seeing the sun and the moon together in a dream indicates the meeting and union of family members. Seeing the sun and the moon in a young man or girl's dream also symbolizes: good news of marriage

title: Urinating in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi for unmarried women

preview.html: Urinating in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi for single and married women, and the dream of urinating in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate kindness, sustenance, and warning according to the dreamer’s condition and the time in which he saw the vision, as many dreams have different interpretations depending on the dream and how events develop during it. Ibn Sirin for an unmarried woman, urinating in a dream according to Ibn Sirin for a married woman, urinating in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi for unmarried women, urinating in a dream by Al-Nabulsi for a married woman. Urinating in a dream according to Ibn Sirin about unmarried women. The interpretation of urinating in a dream for an unmarried woman, as mentioned by the scholar Ibn Sirin, is that It indicates that the dreamer will get rid of worries and problems as quickly as possible, and this is what leads her to many problems due to making these quick decisions, and the interpretation of the dream is related to the situation in which the unmarried girl sees herself. Urinating in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman. It was stated in the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin about the dream of urinating In a dream for a married woman, she is entering into a suspicious business, and there is forbidden money when there is a smell of urine, and if there is a lot of urine in the dream, this indicates the great extravagance that she is incurring for the dreamer, and when the urination is in the form of blood in the dream, this indicates the action of the seer of forbidden things, and the evidence is Upon entering her menstruation, frequent urination. Urination in a dream by Al-Nabulsi for a single woman. Al-Nabulsi mentioned in his interpretation of urination in a dream for unmarried women that for an unmarried woman who finds milk urinating on her clothes, this indicates the abundance of sustenance that will come to the viewer in the near future. As for the feeling of the heat of urine on the clothes, this indicates the good offspring that will be presented, and the vision appeared. Urinating in a dream in Nabulsi for a married woman. There were many interpretations of the dream of urinating in a dream for a married woman who came to Nabulsi, as seeing a married woman urinating in a dream indicates a large amount of glaucoma and many Good things. An increase and abundance of money, and if a woman sees her husband repenting for her in a dream, this indicates that the process of pregnancy will happen soon for the dreamer, God Almighty. It is known that there are many dreams that carry different interpretations depending on the condition of the viewer, and at the end of this article we learned about urinating in a dream from Ibn Sirin for a woman. title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about mice

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about mice: Seeing mice is one of the visions that disgusts many of us, whether in a dream or in waking life, due to the bad relationship between man and the mouse kingdom, and the connotations of his vision vary among scholars due to the great... Controversy and differences between them, but most of the cases in which the seeing mouse appears are not worthy of praise and are not accepted by commentators, and in this article we will look at them in more detail and explanation. Interpretations of a dream about mice: Seeing mice has psychological and ideological connotations, and in the following points we study the psychological aspects: Seeing mice expresses the fears that Live in the heart, obsessions and self-talk that control the person and lead him to actions that do not come from his free will. Seeing rats also represents an increase in the frequency of quarrels and disagreements with friends and relatives and entering into crises and problems with the family and relatives. Symbols of the rat include psychological pressures, responsibilities, heavy burdens, and exhaustion in life. Work, and a person may face problems in his trade and projects, but if he kills mice, he will overcome difficulties, triumph over opponents, and gain great wealth and wealth. Benefit. Interpretation of a dream about mice by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing mice is brief, and the mouse is a thief or thief who takes what is not his and eavesdrops on what is not permissible for him. Whoever sees mice in their different colors and shapes, this indicates adversity and times, the succession of seasons and days, and the constant vicissitudes of life. There are few things left as they are, and mice have other symbols, including that they indicate their existence. Food and kindness. The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, said about mice that they are evil, and this is one of the scourges of immoral women. It has been said that mice are cursed and despicable to women who are prone to evil and corruption. Mice are hated in dreams in most cases. Whoever sees mice eating food in the house, this indicates arrogance, denial of blessings, and failure to preserve them. The viewer may be exposed to theft and harm, and the entry or exit of mice from the house indicates the corruption that is present. It is common among the people of this house. Interpretation of a dream about mice for a single woman: Seeing mice symbolizes bad friends, and the insight may be misunderstood with a lot of confusion and useless talk, or she may be severely harmed by the rumors circulating around her. Whoever sees that he is chasing mice, and following his whims, He runs away from the truth, and may rape others, report bad deeds, and spread rumors without investigation or confirmation. If he is afraid of rats, then he is afraid of a woman coming to him and blackmailing her, and he may be afraid of scandal and revealing secrets. However, if he runs away from rats, then he will leave suspicious places. . And he stays away from the forbidden. What is the interpretation of seeing a white mouse in a dream for a single woman? Seeing mice in different colors is not a good thing, and the white mouse indicates anxiety, instability, and the multiplication of worries and adversities, and she is going through difficult times from which it is difficult to get out without loss. Whoever sees a white mouse, let him review himself in every way. Whatever she says and does, she may commit sin and disobey her, and she does not fear God in her actions. title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about rice

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rice in a dream: Seeing rice is one of the famous visions that is often sought after. This vision has many connotations that vary based on many factors such as the color of the rice, it can be black or white, the rice can be spoiled or rotten, it can be cooked or aged, and what concerns us in this article is the report of all the occasions and connotations of the dream of rice in a dream. Learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin for a dream about riceInterpretations of a dream about rice The interpretation of a dream about rice expresses remarkable progress, achieving the desired success, achieving the desired goal, and enjoying the various abilities that enable the dreamer to reap his goals without putting in much effort. If one sees rice in a dream, this is an indication of achieving a lot of profits and income. In projects that will benefit the owner, whether in the short or long term. Some consider the vision of rice to be one of the visions that express money and are concerned with the practical material aspect, and the owner of this vision is a realistic person who sees things based on the benefits that he will get from them. Every idea does not bring profit and cannot be considered an idea. Seeing rice is also a sign of receiving some bad news that has a negative impact on the dreamer’s life, but he will be able to respond to this news in such a way that he will come out of it with benefit later. And if the dreamer sees rice in his hand, This indicates the struggles that he enters into to achieve the desired goal, and the many battles and competitions that he faces in his work to maintain his position and the level he has reached. Interpretation of a dream about rice by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of the vision of rice that this vision expresses fatigue and unhappiness, and the many obstacles that he faces. A person is on his way and the pain that leaves him with great difficulty. This vision is an indication of the money that the dreamer earns after a difficult period, and the profits that he reaps after serious hardships and disagreements, so there is no room for stability and continuity in his life. If a person sees rice in a dream, this indicates the fluctuations and periods of life. Which is interspersed with difficulties, risks, and sad news. On the other hand, seeing rice is an indication of the total money and fruits that the dreamer will reap after patience, work, perseverance, and many experiments to intensify experiences and expand mental perceptions. Whoever sees that he is peeling rice, this expresses investigation into the source of profit and constant search. About the areas from which a person earns his money, as he tends to defeat suspicions and get rid of the principle of evil. Outdated laws and customs. If the rice is inside its husk, this indicates the accumulation of money and the avoidance of extravagance and saving to the point that a person can reach a state of extreme miserliness. This vision is considered a warning to the individual to achieve a balance between the requirements of his work and his emotional and family side, and the viewer may ignore life. Marital and emotional affairs at the expense of work and administrative affairs. In short, seeing rice expresses satisfaction after distress, success after long patience, and achieving goals after effort and hard work.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a child with blue eyes according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a child with blue eyes in a dream indicates the fulfillment of aspirations and the arrival of good things and other interpretations. We will explain this to the single, married, pregnant, or divorced person, as you dream of a child with blue eyes, or see a child with blue eyes, or a child with blue eyes, or the birth of a beautiful child with blue eyes, By Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Continuation of the topic: Interpretation of seeing a child with blue eyes in a dream. Seeing a child with blue eyes in a dream is a sign of the arrival of good news and good news. Seeing a child with blue eyes in a dream is an indication that something that the dreamer was hoping would come true in the near future. Seeing a child With blue eyes in your dream means that the dreamer will live a happy life and his heart will be filled with happiness and security. In general, seeing a child in a dream portends goodness, because a child is a sign of happiness, joy and joy, and if that child’s eyes are blue, it means that this joy that the dreamer is experiencing will be doubled. In At the same time, this vision means the good news that will reach him in the near future. Seeing that the dreamer is raising a child with blue eyes means success in business in addition to huge profits from the investments that he will make. Seeing a child with blue eyes in a dream means that the dreamer will earn an amount A large amount of money very comfortably and he will get a job because he has been in his career for a long time. Also, dreaming of a child with blue eyes indicates that the dreamer will bring blessings and increase his profit. It also indicates that he does not cause any problem and is trained to do his work properly and better than His other competitors. Seeing a child in a dream means good luck in general, and this vision indicates that happy events will occur, such as attending a party soon with the person you want to marry. A person who has a child with blue eyes in his dream means that he will achieve what he expects and hopes for. Any person Seeing a baby with blue eyes in a dream means comfort, joy, confirmation and getting something on hand that you wanted so badly. The dream of a child with blue eyes is also interpreted as wealth, love of home, and compassion that the dreamer possesses. Seeing blue eyes in a dream indicates the things that the dreamer desires in general and indicates the initiatives and initiatives that the dreamer will take to immediately achieve his desires and aspirations in real life. Seeing people with eyes Blue and those of different colors in a dream are evidence of joy, prosperity, stability and security, and also indicate great successes in practical life. A boy with blue eyes in a dream for an unmarried woman is interpreted as marrying a handsome and rich man. Psychology’s interpretation of seeing a boy with blue eyes in a dream It is that the person who sees such a vision reflects the love for the child in him. In particular, those who want to have a child in real life are likely to see this type of vision. Also, dreams in which the child appears to you reveal the inner feeling of love and human compassion that exists within you. Interpretation of a child with blue eyes in a dream by Ibn Si

title: Interpretation of a dream about green land in a dream

preview.html: Seeing green land in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, whether it is spacious land, beautiful landscapes, rivers, a green plateau, a green garden, a wet land, or agricultural land for a son. Sirin, Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Green land in a dream. One of the very beautiful dreams that shows the goodness and happiness that a person will achieve in the next stage, and he will obtain goodness and abundance, as the green earth symbolizes health and a beautiful life in general life, and many resort to it and obtain peace and comfort from the fatigue of the world and worries, but if you see it in a dream then this It means many indications that we will explain to you in our interpretations, as the translator Ibn Sirin interpreted it in his interpretations for all people. Interpretation of green land in a dream: The vast green land in a dream indicates a prosperous life or a generous and kind woman. Whoever sees a vast green land full of trees or ears, interprets it as good. In nutrition. If he is single, this is good news for him of a blessed marriage if he wants it, and green agricultural lands such as fields, farms, orchards, etc. Including marriage or starting a business that can bring a lot of profits. Interpretation of green land in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing green land in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will have many good things in the next stage and will also have dreams that he is looking for in the near future. The traveler also indicates that he is inside the green land in the dream, and that he will obtain abundant good things in the next stage and obtain money from this trip. If the dreamer sees that he is entering the green land and does not feel safe in public life, this is evidence that he will gain goodness and security in the near future. It restores confidence and reassurance. Seeing a green land with many animals in your dream is evidence that you will soon receive great support from all people. The dreamer who enters the green land with an abundance of monkeys is evidence that he will be surrounded by many hypocrites and deceivers in public life, and seeing snakes in the land Green indicates that he will meet many evil, deceitful and cowardly people. In public life. Like seeing a rabbit in the green land in a dream, he will live in public life with people who have a good heart and will become righteous. Seeing a row of cats and dogs on the green land is evidence that the dreamer will meet many evil people such as envious people and haters in public life. The dream The dreamer who walks in the green land is evidence that he will be strict in all matters and will be able to make many important decisions. Seeing the green land in the dream also indicates that the dreamer will succeed in giving goodness to others and will become good in the near future. Seeing the husband walking in the land Al-Khadra with his wife is evidence of the love and affection between them and that he loves her very much in public life

title: Interpretation of a dream about plucking gray hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of plucking gray hair for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, either by shaving the beard and gray hair in the front of the head, or graying of the eyelashes, according to Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq. And others: plucking gray hair in a dream is one of the very annoying things that we see in our dreams all the time, and it causes a state of tension and conflict in the dreamer because of his fear of the hair and entering the stage of premature graying, which noticeably warns the person of advanced age, as gray hair is a change in hair color that turns to white. Which makes him look young and strange, unlike the black or original color, which is the beginning of the stages of gray hair. Interpretation of plucking gray hair in a dream: Whoever sees that he is plucking gray hair, then he is violating the Sunnah and falling short of good people. Imam Nabulsi explained to us in many of his interpretations that seeing gray hair in a dream is in many ways... Important interpretations that come to the dreamer, which must be known and taken into account. Interpretation of gray hair in a dream Gray hair in a dream is evidence of poverty and unhappiness in life. An increase in the number of gray hair in a dream is evidence of the strength of anxiety and distress that will afflict a person. Seeing white gray hair Completely in a dream is evidence of a misfortune that befalls the closest person. Graying hair in a dream completely indicates the death of one of his family members. Seeing gray hair for a student in a dream is evidence of dignity, good religion, and morals. Seeing a student in a dream that his hair turns gray is evidence of a long life. The dreamer. title: The meaning of a rooster in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a rooster crowing in a dream is one of the popular topics that is often researched and disputed, and the crowing rooster in general is one of the beautiful and beloved things for many, and viewers of this dream are increasingly curious to know useful interpretations and opinions. Therefore, we will explain to you through our article the most important interpretations that you are looking for and show You have some interpretations and opinions of scholars and thinkers about this vision, so follow us to benefit from them. The meaning of a rooster in a dream. The opinions of thinkers and scholars differed in interpreting the meaning of a rooster crowing in a dream. Some of it portends good and some portends evil. Commentators also believe that seeing a rooster crowing in a dream is evidence of the muezzin and the call to prayer. This is considered a warning to him to pray regularly and not to neglect it. But when the dreamer sees in his dream a red rooster crowing, this indicates that the dreamer is characterized by a bad reputation and treatment of others. But if a person dreams of a rooster without crowing, this means that he will obtain a high position in his work. He achieves many achievements and improves his living conditions. The meaning of a rooster in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a rooster’s crow in a dream differed, and its meanings differed according to the circumstances of the fortuneteller. Ibn Sirin says that if the dreamer sees a rooster crowing in his dream, this is a good sign for him, because he will get A lot of livelihood and an important position in his work, and thus he enjoys a decent life. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing an unmarried young man crowing a rooster in a dream is a good sign for him as his wedding date approaches, and his condition improves and he finds a good job. However, if the dreamer sees in his dream that a rooster He crows at night, this means that there will be tension, sadness, and problems in his life, and thus a feeling of despair and fatigue. Interpretation of the meaning of a rooster in one dreamWe continue to talk about the interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman crowing a rooster in her dream, as thinkers and scholars agreed that this vision is good for the unmarried girl. When an unmarried woman sees a rooster crowing in her dream, this indicates a change in her condition and the fulfillment of her desire, and that the date of her marriage is approaching and she will live a happy and stable life. Also, if she sees a red or white rooster crowing, this means that she will succeed in her studies, achieve her future ambitions and goals, and raise her status among others. Her family and friends. What is the meaning of a rooster crowing in a dream for a married woman? The interpretation of the meaning of a rooster in a dream for a married woman is similar to the interpretation of a single dream, and the translator Ibn Sirin agreed with that. Ibn Sirin said: If a married woman sees a rooster crowing in her dream, this indicates her happiness and stability in Her life with her husband and family. If a married woman sees a white rooster crowing in her dream, this means that she will achieve her dreams and overcome the obstacles and problems that stood in the way of her success. The meaning of a rooster in a man’s dreamIt is important to mention the cases in which a man sees a rooster in his dream, which have many interpretations. Miscellaneous: If a man sees in his dream a rooster standing in front of his house, this portends evil. Either one of his relatives is about to die, or they are exposed to a serious illness, and God is Most High.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a lunar eclipse in a dream according to Ibn Sirin in all circumstances

preview.html: Interpretation of a lunar eclipse in a dream If, dear reader, you are searching for an interpretation of a lunar eclipse in a dream, its cracks, and an interpretation of a dream about the eclipse of two moons, here is this article through the encyclopedia. Some may not know what a lunar eclipse actually means in order to understand the interpretations, explanations, and meanings it carries with it, so it is worth mentioning. It is the Earth standing in front of the sunlight, and then it is darkened by the sun’s rays. It is considered one of the rare astronomical phenomena, so the viewer wakes up from its stagnation in search of the symbols it carries. We will review them in our article, so follow us. The majority of scholars and jurists have agreed on the interpretation of dreams that seeing a lunar eclipse is not considered a dream worthy of praise, and God knows best. Because it carries meanings that may indicate failure or problems and obstacles that hinder the progress of the fortuneteller. Seeing a lunar eclipse in a dream symbolizes : Exposing him to a financial loss, perhaps in his work or a new project in which he participates, or he may be exposed to great financial risks. However, it is noted that these losses will pass, God willing, but you must calm down and not take risks and pay attention to spending money. Seeing an eclipse in a dream is interpreted as follows: Next: His scarcity in reality and his reluctance to spend money on his family and himself, which are among the undesirable qualities that our noble Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, referred to. To see an eclipse in a dream is interpreted as follows: The many sins, disobedience, and sins that he committed in his life, you must Return to the Lord with a lot of forgiveness, prayers and supplication to God Almighty. Seeing an eclipse in a dream indicates. The misfortunes that follow the dreamer’s path in life, these crises are represented by the hardship of hand and the need for money, and God knows best. On the contrary, seeing a lunar eclipse in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that bode well, as it symbolizes the date in which the dreamer approaches happiness in Marriage or arriving in an area of ​​financial stability. Interpretation of a dream about a two-moon eclipseSeeing a lunar eclipse is not a good sign. Jurists in the science of dream interpretation said, regarding the interpretation of a dream about a two-moon eclipse: The misfortunes that you find in the dreamer’s life must be endured. Seeing an eclipse of two moons in a dream symbolizes . To be afflicted with a disease, but it will go away by God’s command, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. While it may indicate joy and happiness and the closest happiness to the dreamer in the case of the joy of the dreamer’s soul and his secrets, it indicates the imminent marriage and that God is the Most High. As for seeing the two moons turning into the sun, they They indicate the abundance of sustenance and abundance that God Almighty decrees for the dreamer in his wealth and life, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the sun and the moon meeting in a dream The dreamer wakes up from his slumber, wanting to know the interpretations contained in seeing the sun and moon meeting in a dream. Is it a praiseworthy vision or a vision that does not bode well? ? We explain this in the following lines: Seeing the meeting of the sun and the moon is considered one of the good visions that heralds well. In particular, seeing the sun and the moon together in a dream indicates the meeting and union of family members. Seeing the sun and the moon in a young man or girl’s dream also symbolizes: Good news for the dead.

preview.html: Urinating in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi for single and married women, and the dream of urinating in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate kindness, sustenance, and warning according to the dreamer’s condition and the time in which he saw the vision, as many dreams have different interpretations depending on the dream and how events develop during it. Ibn Sirin for an unmarried woman, urinating in a dream according to Ibn Sirin for a married woman, urinating in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi for unmarried women, urinating in a dream by Al-Nabulsi for a married woman. Urinating in a dream according to Ibn Sirin about unmarried women. The interpretation of urinating in a dream for an unmarried woman, as mentioned by the scholar Ibn Sirin, is that It indicates that the dreamer will get rid of worries and problems as quickly as possible, and this is what leads her to many problems due to making these quick decisions, and the interpretation of the dream is related to the situation in which the unmarried girl sees herself. Urinating in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman. It was stated in the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin about the dream of urinating In a dream for a married woman, she is entering into a suspicious business, and there is forbidden money when there is a smell of urine, and if there is a lot of urine in the dream, this indicates the great extravagance that she is incurring for the dreamer, and when the urination is in the form of blood in the dream, this indicates the action of the seer of forbidden things, and the evidence is Upon entering her menstruation, frequent urination. Urination in a dream by Al-Nabulsi for a single woman. Al-Nabulsi mentioned in his interpretation of urination in a dream for unmarried women that for an unmarried woman who finds milk urinating on her clothes, this indicates the abundance of sustenance that will come to the viewer in the near future. As for the feeling of the heat of urine on the clothes, this indicates the good offspring that will be presented, and the vision appeared. Urinating in a dream in Nabulsi for a married woman. There were many interpretations of the dream of urinating in a dream for a married woman who came to Nabulsi, as seeing a married woman urinating in a dream indicates a large amount of glaucoma and many Good things. An increase and abundance of money, and if a woman sees her husband repenting for her in a dream, this indicates that the process of pregnancy will happen soon for the dreamer, God Almighty. It is known that there are many dreams that carry different interpretations depending on the condition of the viewer, and at the end of this article we learned about urinating in a dream from Ibn Sirin for a woman. title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about mice

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about mice: Seeing mice is one of the visions that disgusts many of us, whether in a dream or in waking life, due to the bad relationship between man and the mouse kingdom, and the connotations of his vision vary among scholars due to the great... Controversy and differences between them However, most of the cases in which the seeing mouse appears are not worthy of praise and are not accepted by commentators, and in this article we will review them in more detail and explanation. Interpretations of a dream about mice Seeing mice has psychological and ideological connotations, and in the following points we study the psychological aspects: Seeing mice expresses the fears that They live in the heart, and the obsessions and self-talk that control the person and lead him to actions that do not come from his free will. Seeing mice also represents an increase in the frequency of quarrels and disagreements with friends and relatives and entering into crises and problems with the family and relatives. Symbols of the mouse include psychological pressures, responsibilities, heavy burdens, and exhaustion in life. Work, and a person may face problems in his trade and projects, but if he kills mice, he will overcome difficulties, triumph over opponents, and gain great wealth and wealth. Benefit. Interpretation of a dream about mice by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing mice is brief, and the mouse is a thief or thief who takes what is not his and eavesdrops on what is not permissible for him. Whoever sees mice in their different colors and shapes, this indicates adversity and times, the succession of seasons and days, and the constant vicissitudes of life. There are few things left as they are, and mice have other symbols, including that they indicate their existence. Food and kindness. The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, said about mice that they are evil, and this is one of the scourges of immoral women. It has been said that mice are cursed and despicable to women who are prone to evil and corruption. Mice are hated in dreams in most cases. Whoever sees mice eating food in the house, this indicates arrogance, denial of blessings, and failure to preserve them. The viewer may be exposed to theft and harm, and the entry or exit of mice from the house indicates the corruption that is present. It is common among the people of this house. Interpretation of a dream about mice for a single woman: Seeing mice symbolizes bad friends, and the insight may be misunderstood with a lot of confusion and useless talk, or she may be severely harmed by the rumors circulating around her. Whoever sees that he is chasing mice, and following his whims, He runs away from the truth, and may rape others, report bad deeds, and spread rumors without investigation or confirmation. If he is afraid of rats, then he is afraid of a woman coming to him and blackmailing her, and he may be afraid of scandal and revealing secrets. However, if he runs away from rats, then he will leave suspicious places. . And he stays away from the forbidden. What is the interpretation of seeing a white mouse in a dream for a single woman? Seeing mice in different colors is not a good thing, and the white mouse indicates anxiety, instability, and the multiplication of worries and adversities, and she is going through difficult times from which it is difficult to get out without loss. Whoever sees a white mouse, let him review himself in every way. Whatever she says and does, she may commit sin and disobey her, and she does not fear God in her actions. title: Interpretation of a dream about lead entering the body

preview.html: In general, bullets in a dream symbolize harsh words and divorce, and through this article on the Interpreter’s website, the largest dream interpretation site in the world, we will learn in detail the meaning of this dream, so stay with us.Interpretation of seeing bullets entering the body in a dream for an unmarried girl. Interpretation of dreams about bullets entering the body of a girl Unmarried in a dream, a sign that the dreamer will be harmed. Anyone who experiences severe pain when bullets enter her body suffers from a severe psychological crisis, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream, this is like being shot by a stranger. It is a sign of dissolution. Her engagement or the end of a romantic relationship in her life that lasted for several years. And whoever sees in her dream bullets hitting her body, a lot of blood will flow from it. It is a sign that the dreamer is spending money and may be exposed to a financial crisis as a result of his wrong actions. See also: Interpretation of a dream about throwing bullets in the air at inappropriate women Married women: Interpretation of seeing bullets entering the body in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees that a bullet hit her body in a dream. It is a sign that someone is misinterpreting her and saying bad things about her. When a married woman sees her boyfriend shooting her in her dream. This expresses that there is a major dispute between them. It may reach the point of rivalry and hostility. title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about rice

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rice in a dream: Seeing rice is one of the famous visions that is often sought after. This vision has many connotations that vary based on many factors such as the color of the rice, it can be black or white, the rice can be spoiled or rotten, it can be cooked or aged, and what concerns us in this article is the report of all the occasions and connotations of the dream of rice in a dream. Learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin for a dream about riceInterpretations of a dream about rice The interpretation of a dream about rice expresses remarkable progress, achieving the desired success, achieving the desired goal, and enjoying the various abilities that enable the dreamer to reap his goals without putting in much effort. If one sees rice in a dream, this is an indication of achieving a lot of profits and income. In projects that will benefit the owner, whether in the short or long term. Some consider the vision of rice to be one of the visions that express money and are concerned with the practical material aspect, and the owner of this vision is a realistic person who sees things based on the benefits that he will get from them. Every idea does not bring profit and cannot be considered an idea. Seeing rice is also a sign of receiving some bad news that has a negative impact on the life of the dreamer, but he will be able to respond to this news in such a way that he will come out of it with benefit later. And if the dreamer sees rice in his hand, This indicates the struggles that he enters into to achieve the desired goal, and the many battles and competitions that he faces in his work to maintain his position and the level he has reached. Interpretation of a dream about rice by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of the vision of rice that this vision expresses fatigue and unhappiness, and the many obstacles that he faces. A person is on his way and the pain that leaves him with great difficulty. This vision is an indication of the money that the dreamer earns after a difficult period, and the profits that he reaps after serious hardships and disagreements, so there is no room for stability and continuity in his life. If a person sees rice in a dream, this indicates the fluctuations and periods of life. Which is interspersed with difficulties, risks, and sad news. On the other hand, seeing rice is an indication of the total money and fruits that the dreamer will reap after patience, work, perseverance, and many experiments to intensify experiences and expand mental perceptions. Whoever sees that he is peeling rice, this expresses investigation into the source of profit and constant search. About the areas from which a person earns his money, as he tends to defeat suspicions and get rid of the principle of evil. Outdated laws and customs. If the rice is inside its husk, this indicates the accumulation of money and the avoidance of extravagance and saving to the point that a person can reach a state of extreme miserliness. This vision is considered a warning to the individual to achieve a balance between the requirements of his work and his emotional and family side, and the viewer may ignore life. Marital and emotional affairs at the expense of work and administrative affairs. In short, seeing rice expresses satisfaction after distress, success after long patience, and achieving goals after effort and hard work.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a child with blue eyes according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a child with blue eyes in a dream indicates the fulfillment of aspirations and the arrival of good things and other interpretations. We will explain this to the single, married, pregnant, divorced, as you dream of a child with blue eyes, or you see a child with blue eyes, or a child with blue eyes, or the birth of a beautiful child with blue eyes, by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others Continuing the topic: Interpretation of seeing a child with blue eyes in a dream Seeing a child with blue eyes in a dream is a sign of the arrival of good news and good news and seeing a child with blue eyes in a dream is an indication that something that the dreamer hoped would come true in the near future. Seeing a child with blue eyes in your dream means that the dreamer will live a happy life and his heart will be filled with happiness and security. In general, seeing a child in a dream portends good, because the child is a sign of happiness, joy and pleasure, and if that child's eyes are blue, this means that this joy that the dreamer is going through will double. At the same time, this vision means the good news that will reach him in the near future. Seeing that the dreamer is raising a child with blue eyes means success in business in addition to huge profits from the investments he will make. Seeing a child with blue eyes in The dream means that the dreamer will earn a large amount of money very comfortably and will get a job due to his presence in his career for a long time. The dream of a child with blue eyes also indicates that the dreamer will come with blessings and increase his profit, and it also indicates that he does not cause any problem and is trained to perform his work correctly and better than his other competitors. Seeing a child in a dream means good luck in general, and this vision indicates the occurrence of happy events, such as attending a party soon with the person you want to marry. The person who has a child with blue eyes in his dream means that he will achieve what he expects and hopes for. Anyone who sees a child with blue eyes in a dream means comfort, joy, affirmation, and getting something from a side that you wanted badly. The dream of a child with blue eyes is also interpreted as wealth, love of home, and mercy possessed by the dreamer. Seeing blue eyes in a dream indicates the things that the dreamer generally desires and indicates the initiatives and initiatives that the dreamer will take to immediately achieve his desires and aspirations in real life. Seeing people with blue eyes and different colors in a dream is evidence of joy, prosperity, stability, and security, and it also indicates great successes in practical life. The boy with blue eyes in a dream is interpreted for an unmarried woman as marrying a handsome and rich man. The psychological interpretation of seeing a boy with blue eyes in a dream is that the person who sees such a vision reflects the love of the child in him. In particular, those who want to have a child in real life are likely to see this type of vision. Also, dreams in which the child appears to you reveal the inner feeling of love and human compassion that exists within you. Interpretation of a child with blue eyes in a dream by Ibn See

title: Interpretation of a dream about green land

preview.html: Seeing green land in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, whether it is spacious land, beautiful landscapes, rivers, a green plateau, a green garden, a wet land, or agricultural land for a son. Sirin, Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Green land in a dream. One of the very beautiful dreams that shows the goodness and happiness that a person will achieve in the next stage, and he will obtain goodness and abundance, as the green earth symbolizes health and beautiful life in general life, and many resort to it and obtain peace and comfort from the fatigue of the world and worries, but if you see it in a dream then this It means many indications that we will explain to you in our interpretations, as the translator Ibn Sirin interpreted it in his interpretations for all people. Interpretation of green land in a dream: The vast green land in a dream indicates a prosperous life or a generous and kind woman. Whoever sees a vast green land full of trees or ears, interprets it as good. In nutrition. If he is single, this is good news for him of a blessed marriage if he wants it, and green agricultural lands such as fields, farms, orchards, etc. Including marriage or starting a business that can bring a lot of profits. Interpretation of green land in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing green land in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will have many good things in the next stage and will also have dreams that he is looking for in the near future. The traveler also indicates that he is inside the green land in the dream, and that he will obtain abundant good things in the next stage and obtain money from this trip. If the dreamer sees that he is entering the green land and does not feel safe in public life, this is evidence that he will gain goodness and security in the near future. It restores confidence and reassurance. Seeing a green land with many animals in your dream is evidence that you will soon receive great support from all people. The dreamer who enters the green land with an abundance of monkeys is evidence that he will be surrounded by many hypocrites and deceivers in public life, and seeing snakes in the land Green indicates that he will meet many evil, deceitful and cowardly people. In public life. Like seeing a rabbit in the green land in a dream, he will live in public life with people who have a good heart and will become righteous. Seeing a row of cats and dogs on the green land is evidence that the dreamer will meet many evil people such as envious people and haters in public life. The dream The dreamer who walks in the green land is evidence that he will be strict in all matters and will be able to make many important decisions. Seeing the green land in the dream also indicates that the dreamer will succeed in giving goodness to others and will become good in the near future. Seeing the husband walking in the land Al-Khadra with his wife is evidence of the love and affection between them and that he loves her very much in public life
